name: EV Impact Analysis
query: What is the impact of electric vehicle adoption on copper demand? Show me the copper intensity difference between BEVs and ICE vehicles and project the automotive copper demand trajectory.
expected_behavior: Identifies copper intensity coefficients: BEV (83 kg) vs ICE (23 kg)
Calculates 3.6x ratio between BEV and ICE copper intensity
Shows automotive copper demand growth from 2020-2045
Breaks down automotive demand into ICE vs BEV components
Shows BEV share increasing over time reaching 75-92% by 2045 depending on scenario
Calculates EV demand as percentage of total copper consumption
Explains that automotive segment grows from ~8% to ~19% of total demand due to EV transition
